name: 小石冒险 Koishi Adventure⁓
description:
Koishi Adventure is a 2D top-down slash-and-shoot Touhou Project doujin RPG, where you'll be adventuring in the absurd and brutal world of Lotusland from the perspective of the Komeiji Koishi~
In the game, you can wander around, challenge various enemies, learn skills, collect various weapons and equipment or companions, and constantly strengthen your team~

Slash and Shoot

You can use melee weapons to attack, block, and bounce off enemy attacks. If you meet an enemy who is willing to fight you one-on-one in melee, you will be able to fencing "bang-bang-bang" with her!😊


Ranged attacks are also an important part of the game, as you can use guns, bows, arrows, throws and magic to attack remotely. You can kill quite powerful enemies with the right kind of long range attacks!😊


Explore and Collect

You can move around the game as you please, from the Hakurei Shrine all the way west to the banks of the Sanzu River, or from the Bamboo Forest of the Lost all the way north up to Youkai Mountain. Or you can find the entrances to certain dungeons in the wild or simply swing your pickaxe and dig down into the underworld. You don't need to wait for the game map loading, except for vertical movement.
The map of the game is divided into several different areas, each area will brush different monsters, some areas of the monsters are very manic. Please save game data before go to those areas😊

In the game you may obtain equipment or materials by killing enemies, completing quests, opening dungeon chests or even destroying walls. The dropped equipment will have a chance to have randomized enchantments attached to it, and powerful enchantments can make even the most basic weapon as deadly as an godly artifact!😊

The game allows you to collect not only items but also companions! When you defeat an enemy, she may fall to the ground and cry for help. When you save your enemy, she may offer to join your team! Of course, the enemy may also stab you directly after being rescued, so it's best to grab her and take off her gear before rescuing her!😊

Quests and Plots

Currently there are some storyline quests to guide you in exploring the game world, and in the future maybe we will add side quests and randomized events to make this game a high freedom open world game😭

Workshop Contents

Module-related functionality will be available in the beta for the time being, allowing you to define your own modules via scripts, add additional graphics, sound resources, and trigger code supported by the game.
